name: Helix Logistics Partners, Inc.
description: Helix Logistics Partners, Inc. is a leading provider of integrated logistics solutions, specializing in supply chain management, freight transportation, and warehousing services. Founded in 2010, the company has rapidly grown to serve a diverse range of industries, including retail, manufacturing, and e-commerce. Helix focuses on optimizing logistics processes through innovative technology, data analytics, and strategic partnerships. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services such as inventory management, last-mile delivery, and freight forwarding, all designed to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. With a commitment to sustainability, Helix is also pioneering eco-friendly logistics practices, including the use of electric vehicles in its fleet and sustainable packaging solutions. The company is dedicated to providing tailored logistics solutions that meet the unique needs of its clients, ensuring that they remain competitive in an ever-evolving market. As Helix continues to expand its global footprint, it aims to leverage its expertise and technology to drive innovation in the logistics sector and contribute to the future of supply chain solutions.

seo.meta_title: Helix Logistics Partners, Inc. | Integrated Logistics Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Helix Logistics Partners, Inc., a leader in integrated logistics solutions, providing innovative supply chain management services to diverse industries.

faq.question: What services does Helix Logistics provide?
faq.answer: Helix Logistics provides integrated logistics solutions, including freight transportation, warehousing, and inventory management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Helix Logistics?
faq.answer: Jessica Tran is the CEO of Helix Logistics Partners, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Helix Logistics headquartered?
faq.answer: Helix Logistics is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
